title: Movement along short-run Phillips curve when

content.question: Movement along the short-run Phillips curve describes the relationship between inflation and unemployment when

choices.label: aggregate demand changes for a given short-run aggregate supply curve
short-run aggregate supply changes for a given aggregate demand curve
aggregate demand decreases and short-run aggregate supply increases
aggregate demand increases and short-run aggregate supply decreases
policy changes are perfectly anticipated and the aggregate supply curve is vertical

content.answer: aggregate demand changes for a given short-run aggregate supply curve
